sn47.26:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano ayasma ca anuruddho sakete viharanti kandakivane.
sn47.26:1.2: Atha kho ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthita yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anuruddhena saddhim sammodimsu.
sn47.26:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn47.26:1.5: Kittavata nu kho, avuso, sekho hoti”ti?
sn47.26:1.6: “Catunnam kho, avuso, satipatthananam padesam bhavitatta sekho hoti.
sn47.26:2.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.26:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.26:2.6: Imesam kho, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam padesam bhavitatta sekho hoti”ti.
